replies.body: Is it just me or does Morg's Q move faster?

Being in OCE, it's like a tease... We have knowledge of everything coming out but we are last to get it. We wait like what? an extra 2-4 weeks for it.

Personally i like the update, it looks rather nice. Some skins however i think would look better if the ability matched the skin colors. 

Also personally it seemed to me her snare is actually slower not faster. I have played {{champion:25}}  since i started league (which actually compared to most of you would still make me a noob lol) and her snare definitely seems to have slowed down a bit...... so i guess this subject is mute given they didn't change that at all and there are reports it looks faster. i would wager same pace just the graphic make it look different :) <3

Why are Xeraths Hit Boxes still not accurately portrayed? The hit box is definitely much larger than the visuals show. Please fix this as it's ridiculous how many times I've gotten out of it and still to be hit. The same goes for Jinx slow... That thing is WAY bigger than it looks... Should be a massive CORK or something... not this tiny little popper with a huge nasty hitbox. Counterplay is a visual thing too... I thought these problems were obvious!
its because either thats right or the champion's hitbox is bigger than it looks either one
